mixture.name: Laxo-lax Tab
mixture.ingredients: Frangula purshiana bark + Ox bile extract + Phenolphthalein

mixture.name: Dygest
mixture.ingredients: Glycine betaine + Ox bile extract + Pancrelipase + Papain + Peppermint + Pepsin

mixture.name: Alka-pan Tablets
mixture.ingredients: Bromelains + Glycine betaine + Ox bile extract + Pancrelipase + Papaya

drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Ox bile extract can be decreased when used in combination with Desogestrel.
